structure.unit: ARTICLE CIX. SAUSALITO BAY COMMUNITY DEVELOPMENT DISTRICT

text.section:
Sec. 2-1642. Petition.
The Petition to establish the Sausalito Bay Community Development District over the real property described in Exhibit A attached to the ordinance from which this article derives, which was filed by Lennar-Century 8th Street Developers, J.V., a Florida joint venture, on February 25, 2003 and which Petition is on file at the Office of the Clerk of the Board, is hereby granted. A copy of the Petition is attached in its entirety and incorporated herein (Exhibit B).
